blogPost.excerpt: doodad.dev is a site for tools to make the internet faster, more accessible, and more expressive. The pattern generator helps you make seamless, unique, royalty-free patterns. You can export as SVG, JPEG, or PNG. It's free forever, no tracking, etc. Enjoy!
blogPost.body: doodad.dev is a site for tools to make the internet faster, more accessible, and more expressive. The pattern generator helps you make seamless, unique, royalty-free patterns. You can export as SVG, JPEG, or PNG. It's free forever, no tracking, etc. Enjoy!
blogPost.title: Doodad Pattern Generator - Create unique, seamless, royalty-free patterns
blogPost.author: Nathaniel

localize.description: doodad.dev是一个让互联网更快、更方便、更有表现力的工具网站。图案生成器可以帮助你制作无缝、独特、免版税的图案。你可以导出为SVG、JPEG或PNG格式。它永远免费，没有跟踪等。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 创建独特、无缝、免版税的图案

localize.description: doodad.dev是一個讓互聯網更快、更方便、更有表現力的工具網站。圖案生成器可以幫助你製作無縫、獨特、免版稅的圖案。你可以導出爲SVG、JPEG或PNG格式。它永遠免費，沒有跟蹤等。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 創建獨特、無縫、免版稅的圖案

previous.title: The CEO known for increasing his employees’ base annual pay to $70,000 says wealthy people donating and getting rewarded with “glowing articles, a hospital named after you and a massive tax write-off” amount to “one of capitalism’s biggest PR scams.” https://t.co/iEvy0Sv8Cc

localize.full_text: 这位因将员工基本年薪提高到7万美元而闻名的CEO表示，富人捐款并获得 "光鲜亮丽的文章、以你名字命名的医院和大量的税收减免 "的奖励，相当于 "资本主义最大的公关骗局之一 "https://t.co/iEvy0Sv8Cc。
這位因將員工基本年薪提高到7萬美元而聞名的CEO表示，富人捐款並獲得 "光鮮亮麗的文章、以你名字命名的醫院和大量的稅收減免 "的獎勵，相當於 "資本主義最大的公關騙局之一 "https://t.co/iEvy0Sv8Cc。

next.excerpt: Are you a start up or a solo founder? don't have much funds to hire an animator/video editor to show case your product? worry not! videofork.co is here for you!! A free web based animation tool to create explainer videos for your startup/side project.
next.title: Videofork.co - Create explainer videos & GIFs for your startup for free

localize.description: 你是一个初创公司或一个单独的创始人吗？ 没有太多的资金来聘请一个动画师/视频编辑来展示你的产品？ 不用担心！Videofork.co在这里为你服务！。一个免费的基于网络的动画工具，为你的创业公司/副业项目创建解释视频。
localize.tagline: 免费为您的创业公司创建解释视频和GIFs

localize.description: 你是一個初創公司或一個單獨的創始人嗎？ 沒有太多的資金來聘請一個動畫師/視頻編輯來展示你的產品？ 不用擔心！Videofork.co在這裏爲你服務！。一個免費的基於網絡的動畫工具，爲你的創業公司/副業項目創建解釋視頻。
localize.tagline: 免費爲您的創業公司創建解釋視頻和GIFs
